sets.description: Increase frost ATK by **8%/10%/12%/15%** for **10** seconds when switching between frost weapons. This effect works in the background, and if multiple sets are used, the highest star set will take effect.
When unleashing a frost domain with the weapon Balmung, enemies within the frost domain receive frost damage equal to **55%/65%/75%/85%** of frost ATK every second.
